reviews.review: Good and funny game.Play as a smart,helpful and jukeful survivor or a "knowing your next move" ruthless killer. Although there are a few disadvantages this is by far one of the best game to play with friends. There are some in-game bugs but you can cope with them. The community is mixed. You can get toxic and selfish (not alturistic) players in your lobby or unsportsmanlike killer like camping you and you are doomed or you can have luck playing with smart and "taking things for the team" guys and a fair killer. The Devs are doing good work putting out often good and intersting DLCs. The last update on the "paced leveling bloodwebs" is great. Get a group of good friends and enjoy this stuff. You won`t regret it. Devs still pulling out new content and keeps the game alive.

I love playing this game with friends, the community over all is pretty friendly for the most part. 
Often giving the community new DLC and challenges makes it nice to come together. 
I throughly enjoy it and would recommend it.
Muito bom o jogo porém esteja sempre preparado para ter uns acessos de raiva vez ou outra.

love getting raped by scary killers, 10/10  would get rapped 24/7

This is a game that will make you rage, come with that in mind, you are gonna rage because some hits aren't really hits, because a survivor just teabags all of the match, cause' a bug just breaks your gameplay and you are stuck in a rock until you die (as a survivor) or until the survivors run away (as a killer). Besides this, this is a great game, makes you really try to survive or win, even if you don't get really out of It. Sometimes it becomes kinda boring, cause' It's always the same: get camped, you die cause' of your teammates, same killers, same perks, but you kinda love that sensation of winning or raging, that's the true, that's is why I'm with 1,000 hours in this game. What you really end up liking most about this game is that the developers are always updating, with 'free' killers or with licensed ones, at least you get a lot of fun an always can expect something.
It's a pretty good game, pretty meh, nothing new or exciting, but pretty fun too. A pretty solid 7/10 (after playing 1,000 hours, this is the most that you can get really haha).
P.D: I re-did this review, from spanish to english and the first time I did a review of this game, I had 300 hours, now I have over 1,000 hours, help. P.D.2: Still pretty good P.D.3: Full of content still
갓겜과 똥겜을 넘나드는 게임..

I've spent 600 hours in this game, The game has some flaws which i hopefully get fixed but theirs constant updates with patches and content and even iconic characters like Bill from left for dead as a free update and dlc characters that are worth buying like Michael myers and leatherface and you can even learn perks from other characters to make your favorite killer or survivor stronger, Each killer has special abilities that change the style of gameplay each match making replay ablility fun but with teachable perks its basically unlimited because you don't know what survivor or killer going to go up against in trial or at you at a lower rank. They even have killers that counter play styles and perks making it even more difficult to keep a solid play style threw the game.

Love this game so much and love how my friends and I have truly learned to work as a team while playing it. The original killers are great and the liscensed ones are some of my favorite slasher movie killers ever, especially Freddy.
This game is very fun to play with or without friends.

Я думаю невозможно найти человека, который бы не хотел поиграть в игровые аналоги фильмов "пятница 13-ое"(хотя для этого уже есть отдельная игра), "техасская резня бензопилой", "хэллоуин" и т.д. - лично я, дак точно всегда. И на наше счастье (или горе) в 2к!6 году вышла игра Dead by Daylight, аналогом который были лишь гниющие в альфа-версиях в гринлайте непонятные игрульки. Игра вышла кривой, недоделанной, некоторые механики работали откровенно ужасно; сейчас проблем поубавилось, контента подвезли, много чего довели накоцен-таки до ума. В игре ужасный хостинг (его роль исполняет убийца) - выделенные сервера?! Нет, мы о таком не слышали; благодаря чему игр с пингом 70- вы будете встречать очень редко... Так же в игре невозмутимо долгий поиск игр лобби с друзьями - эта проблема вытекает из предыдущей. Но все это мелочи, эта игра о том, "как стать убийцей" и поймать пару тройку людишек в капканчик)) распилить пилой или же... пытаться сбежать от сумасшедших любителей крюков. Можно даже закрыть глаза на бесконечный гринд и фарм, удовольствие можно получать от каждой каточки)) В любом случае, в проекты подобного жанры по моему мнению, должен сыграть каждый, просто попробовать, а там, глядишь, и зайдет)

I've been playing DbD since the beginning and while the updates have had their ups and downs (and boy, have they really), I would still recommend this game. I would like to put up a warning for the rather toxic community infesting it, but the gameplay alone keeps me coming back. I love the monster designs, especially the Behaviour Digital original ones, and there isn't anything as exciting as juking a killer around a simple tree.

Hard to say, the game have pros and cons. 
-PROS: 
A good survival expirience
A good killer expririence
A lot of gameplay styles with survivors and killers using different perks
Each killers feel unique
Can make you feel really tense while playing and at the same time can make you feel really good but escaping the killer as a survivor, or catch a survivor as a killer
The gameplay overall is satisfying
The killer abilities are really well made for the killer, they feel good to use
Really good expirience when played with friends, "Survive with friends" or "Kill your friends" modes

-CONS: 
Survivors are not unique, they do nothing in special, you can teach the perks to others, so you have no incentive to play one specific survivor
Toxicity is kinda common between players, survivors and killers
Some balance issues, some perks, items or add-ons
The objectives as a survivor can feel very boring as time goes on, the skill check mechanic is kinda basic. Just the generators as an objective can become too repetitive
The matchmaking and rank system is kinda broken atm

This buggy mess is either a very entertaining game of cat and mouse or a somewhat boring game of hide and seek. There is a decent bit of depth to understanding the basic gameplay, the different killers, and the ever growing amount of perks. Expect to lose many times before you win and understand the meta before trying to reach the top. Knowing this beforehand will save a lot of frustrations.
Amazingly Fun to play with friends, Fuck the Hex Ruin
muy buen juego, divertido, en especial con amigos. Y está bueno hacer sufrir a los sobrevivientes cuando jugás solo.

This game although not perfect, is honestly such a joy. That fear factor is always there, even though it does lowkey subside once you get used to you know, killers coming out of nowhere, the fear of getting to that board, the suspense as run for a window, the angst as you struggle to get out of a killer's grip as you get closer and closer to a hook. OKAY but, this is such an enjoyable game with great variety in both KILLERS and SURVIVORS, with cosmetics that spice things up. The leveling system suits this game great and I it keeps you wanting to fight for a rank each new season. Comparing this to F13 is bull FYI because both are different games that have unique things about them, although I do suggest both. Overall it's definitely worth the buy, even more so on sale.

Enfim, dando inicio a análise, o JOGO em si é bem legal e divertido da pra gastar várias e várias horas jogando (eu que o diga). Mas acontece que parece que o JOGO e as PARTIDAS estão sempre desniveladas, nunca dão enfoque maior aos sobreviventes e só tacam mais e mais buffs nos killers.
Acredito que ainda falta algo no jogo por que afinal de contas depois de 700 horas jogando você acaba ficando cansado da mesmice... Gostaria de ver outra att igual a da huntress que entrasse itens a mais no mapa ou no game em si.

В игре огромное множество багов, создающих дисбаланс. Разработчики постоянно добавляют что-то в игру, фиксят старые баги и добавляют новые - очевидно, чтобы игрокам было не скучно. Играть порой становится невыносимо, у моих друзей бомбит от этой игры по несколько раз на дню. Но мы возвращаемся в эту игру снова и снова. Каждый день. Я не знаю, почему. Наверное, потому что разработчики проделали "pretty good job so far".
